A masterpiece just as his last film, Songer från andra våningen. 
People should buy this movie to support Roy Andersson. He had to pledge personal belongings to finance it. 

For you that don't know: 
- All scenes (exept one) are recorded in his studio. So everything that you see is built, rooms, models of houses and surroundings.
- All the characters in the movie are played by non-actors.
damn thats impressive, but wouldn't have been cheaper if he didn't shoot everything in his studio? :S
sockertopp, kattfot, bästa medpirater! Tusen tack för detta guldverk.
